name: Beachfront Fighter
description:
This is a game about fighting beachgoers that threaten your beach time.

CONTROLS: 

A and D: Left and right

J: Punch, K: Kick

N: Hide decorations, M: Stop music

CREDITS:

All visuals and code are done by me. BUT the song is done by Kevin MacLeod. The idea was given by my sister.

This game was made for the Seaside 2022 Mini Jam

REFLECTION:

The limitation was that everything dies in one hit. I took this limitation in a simple way to test my capabilities as it is my first time participating in a weekend-long game jam.  I'm excited to participate in upcoming game jams and test my capabilities further.
